      • tar

        public static void tar(Path inputPath,
                       Path outputPath,
                       boolean gZipped,
                       boolean childrenOnly)
                throws IOException
        Recursively tar file
        Parameters:
        inputPath - file path can be directory
        outputPath - where to put the archived file
        childrenOnly - if inputPath is directory and if childrenOnly is true, the archive will contain all of its children, else the archive contains unique entry which is the inputPath itself
        gZipped - compress with gzip algorithm
        Throws:
        IOException

        Parameters:

        destination - The destination folder in which to save the file.
        Throws:

        public static String getSHA1Checksum(Path path)

        Returns:

      • deepSHA1

        public static String deepSHA1(Path rootPath)
        Computes a SHA-1 checksum on a directory. The checksum ignores hidden files.
        Parameters:
        rootPath - The root path for which to compute SHA-1 on every sub files and folders.
        Returns:
        The SHA-1 hash string.
